name: 现代杂志
description: 现代编辑风格，主题蓝点缀，简洁专业，科技感

h1.base: margin: 32px 0 16px; font-size: 2.5em; letter-spacing: -0.02em; line-height: 1.2; position: relative; padding-left: 20px;

styles.paragraph: line-height: 1.8; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 24px; font-size: 1em; color: #4b5563; letter-spacing: 0.05em;

list.item: font-size: 1em; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.8; margin-bottom: 16px; padding-left: 40px; position: relative;

code.block: color: #1f2937; background: #f8fafc; border-radius: 8px; border-left: 4px solid #3B82F6; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.06); margin: 1.2em 0; padding: 1.2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.7; white-space: pre-wrap;
code.inline: background: #EFF6FF; padding: 3px 8px; border-radius: 4px; color: #1E40AF; font-size: 14px; border: none;

styles.quote: border-left: 4px solid #3B82F6; border-radius: 0 8px 8px 0; padding: 16px 20px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8fafc 0%, #EFF6FF 100%); margin: 1.2em 0; color: #374151; font-style: italic; word-wrap: break-word;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1.5em auto; display: block; border-radius: 8px; border: 2px solid rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.3); padding: 4px;
styles.link: color: #3B82F6; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 2px solid #3B82F6; transition: all 0.2s ease;

emphasis.em: font-style: italic; color: #4b5563; background: linear-gradient(180deg, transparent 60%, #FEF3C7 60%);

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1.2em 0; border-collapse: collapse; border-radius: 8px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.06);
table.header: background: #3B82F6; font-weight: bold; color: #ffffff; font-size: 1em; padding: 12px;

styles.hr: border: none; height: 1px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, #3B82F6, transparent); margin: 32px 0;

footnote.ref: color: #3B82F6; text-decoration: none; font-size: 0.85em; vertical-align: super;
